summary: Adds an awesome Elven bow and arrow to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-2-1395446845.jpg [/img][/center]
[center]Made by Master Bowyer Karagorm of Valenwood, passed down to his son upon his death and Stolen by Angorn the younger. Knowing of Angorns plight and the love for Angorns father Karagorm's son forgave the theft and gave him the bow after the fact and without Angorn's knowledge.

Angorn the younger took BearClaw and the arrows to aid in his search for his missing father who left for Skyrim years before. A surprise attack by a bear in Brood Cavern while searching for clues to his missing father he was mortaly wounded.

You the Dragonborn have found him and have taken posesion of BearClaw and it's arrows to aid in your battles in Skyrim.

Master Bowyer Karagorm, who despised all evil has blessed the bow to give the owner the ability to craft copies and more arrows upon being given the bow. Angorn the younger knew of this blessing and wrote a letter gifting the bow to anyone that finds his body just incase he failed in his quest to find his father.[/center]

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-3-1395446845.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Info[/size][/b][/center]

-Includes the named bow BearClaw, craftable versions of the bow for followers, normal type arrows, flame exploding arrows, Frost arrows, and shock arrows.
-Bows are 1 point more damage than Dragonbone from Dawnguard.
-Arrows are 1 point more damage than Deadric.
-BearClaw and the arrows can be found in Brood Cavern next to a chest.
-Fully enchantable and upgradeable.
-Exploding arrows and note is found on Angorn's body. Loot him.
-To be able to craft more arrows and bows for your followers you must read the note found on Angorn's body.
-Once the note is read you can craft more at any forge. The note is not required when crafting but must be read once to be able to craft.
-Craftable in the Elven section of the crafting menu.
-Optional vanilla version without Dawnguard and explosive arrows. Use only 1 version.
-Optional reduced shine texture available. requires the main file or the optional vanilla file.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-4-1395446845.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Requirements[/size][/b][/center]

-Skyrim 1.9+.
-Main file requires Dawnguard.
-Optional vanilla version does not require Dawnguard but also does not include explosive arrows.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-5-1395446846.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Version and update info[/size][/b][/center]

Version 1:
Initial release.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-5-1395446846.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Compatibility and conflicts[/size][/b][/center]

May conflict with anything that changes Brood Cavern.

SkyRe: According to T3nd0 the author of SkyRe it is compatible if you the user properly configure the patcher xml file according to the documentation. I will not be making a SkyRe patch because there is no need for one.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-5-1395446846.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Install and uninstall[/size][/b][/center]

To install unpack the archive into your Skyrim data folder. Enable BearClawBow.esp in the launcher.

To uninstall open the console in the game by hitting ~ (the tilde key) and type "removeperk XX01BBEF" without quotes and XX is the load order number of the mod, save your game. Then delete BearClawBow.esp and BearClawBow.bsa.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-5-1395446846.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]NMM Support[/size][/b][/center]

Use the forums for NMM support. It does not belong in mod comments. If NMM cannot handle placing a .bsa and a .esp in the data folder and enabling it then there is nothing I can do about it and I do not want to know about it. If you have an issue installing and you say you used NMM my answer is "Install manually and delete NMM." There! I answered so please do not ask again.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-5-1395446846.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Use permissions[/size][/b][/center]

-Under NO circumstances are my models to be hosted anywhere else without my permission.
-Translating is fine but must require downloading from here. Link to the comments here to the translation.
-Retexturing is fine and even encouraged as long as the meshes are downloaded from here. Link to the comments here to the retexture please.
-To use in another mod with the meshes downloaded with that mod requires my permission. If I do not answer the request because I did not see it the answer is no.

[center][img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52297-5-1395446846.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=6]Other mods by me[/size][/b][/center]
